entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then snow or rain changing to ice pellets or rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
